compatibility.overview: Personal Year 1 marks a new 9-year cycle of growth and fresh beginnings. This year is perfect for starting new ventures, setting bold goals, and taking leadership roles.
compatibility.bestMatchesDesc: Years 1, 3, and 5 amplify your pioneering energy with creative inspiration and adventurous momentum.
compatibility.goodMatchesDesc: Years 7 and 9 provide spiritual wisdom and humanitarian vision to guide your new journey.
compatibility.challengingMatchesDesc: Years 2, 4, 6, and 8 may feel slow or restrictive compared to your need for independence and innovation.

compatibility.overview: Personal Year 2 focuses on cooperation, partnerships, and patient development. This year emphasizes building relationships and working collaboratively toward your goals.
compatibility.bestMatchesDesc: Years 2, 4, 6, and 8 support your collaborative nature with stability, structure, and shared ambitions.
compatibility.goodMatchesDesc: Years 7 and 9 add wisdom and compassionate understanding to your diplomatic approach.
compatibility.challengingMatchesDesc: Years 1, 3, and 5 may create tension with their independent and spontaneous energies.

compatibility.overview: Personal Year 3 is a time of creative expansion, self-expression, and social growth. This year favors artistic pursuits, communication, and building your network.
compatibility.bestMatchesDesc: Years 1, 3, and 5 fuel your creative fire with leadership energy and freedom of expression.
compatibility.goodMatchesDesc: Years 6 and 9 bring nurturing support and humanitarian purpose to your creative endeavors.
compatibility.challengingMatchesDesc: Years 2, 4, 7, and 8 may dampen your spontaneous creative spirit with excessive structure or introspection.

compatibility.overview: Personal Year 4 emphasizes hard work, organization, and building solid foundations. This year requires patience, discipline, and systematic effort toward long-term goals.
compatibility.bestMatchesDesc: Years 2, 4, 6, and 8 support your methodical approach with cooperation, stability, and ambitious planning.
compatibility.goodMatchesDesc: Years 1 and 9 add leadership direction and humanitarian purpose to your diligent work.
compatibility.challengingMatchesDesc: Years 3, 5, and 7 may feel too scattered, unpredictable, or theoretical for your practical focus.

compatibility.overview: Personal Year 5 brings freedom, adventure, and significant changes. This year encourages travel, learning new skills, and breaking free from restrictive patterns.
compatibility.bestMatchesDesc: Years 1, 3, and 5 match your adventurous spirit with leadership courage and creative exploration.
compatibility.goodMatchesDesc: Years 7 and 9 add depth, wisdom, and meaning to your adventures and explorations.
compatibility.challengingMatchesDesc: Years 2, 4, 6, and 8 may feel too restrictive or routine-focused for your need for variety and freedom.

compatibility.overview: Personal Year 6 centers on home, family, and nurturing responsibilities. This year emphasizes caring for others, creating beauty, and strengthening family bonds.
compatibility.bestMatchesDesc: Years 2, 4, 6, and 8 support your nurturing focus with cooperation, stability, and practical foundations.
compatibility.goodMatchesDesc: Years 3 and 9 add joy, creativity, and compassionate service to your caring nature.
compatibility.challengingMatchesDesc: Years 1, 5, and 7 may feel too independent, restless, or detached for your family-focused energy.

compatibility.overview: Personal Year 7 encourages introspection, study, and spiritual development. This year is perfect for research, meditation, and deepening your understanding of life's mysteries.
compatibility.bestMatchesDesc: Years 5, 7, and 9 complement your introspective nature with exploration, wisdom, and spiritual insight.
compatibility.goodMatchesDesc: Years 2 and 4 provide gentle support and structure for your contemplative and studious pursuits.
compatibility.challengingMatchesDesc: Years 1, 3, 6, and 8 may feel too demanding, social, or externally focused for your need for solitude and reflection.

compatibility.overview: Personal Year 8 focuses on material achievement, business success, and recognition. This year brings opportunities for financial growth and career advancement.
compatibility.bestMatchesDesc: Years 2, 4, 6, and 8 support your ambitious goals with cooperation, hard work, and practical foundations.
compatibility.goodMatchesDesc: Year 1 adds leadership initiative and pioneering energy to complement your business acumen.
compatibility.challengingMatchesDesc: Years 3, 5, 7, and 9 may distract from your material focus with creative, adventurous, or idealistic pursuits.

compatibility.overview: Personal Year 9 completes the 9-year cycle with a focus on completion, humanitarian service, and preparing for renewal. This year emphasizes giving back and letting go of what no longer serves.
compatibility.bestMatchesDesc: Years 3, 6, and 9 amplify your compassionate nature with creativity, nurturing service, and shared humanitarian vision.
compatibility.goodMatchesDesc: Years 1, 2, and 7 add leadership, cooperation, and wisdom to support your humanitarian efforts.
compatibility.challengingMatchesDesc: Years 4, 5, and 8 may feel too practical, restless, or material-focused for your generous, completion-oriented energy.
